body: Big tiddie waifu is more important than school. I knew really fucking stupid people with PhDs when I was in college. People that didn't know it was a bad idea to go off-roading in a Mini Cooper at night in mountain lion territory. When you realize that approximately 80% of people in high-paid positions of authority are in fact, stupider than you, you can correctly prioritize what is important in life.
he was stupid from the get-go for calling her stupid to her face anyway

For someone that always gets 💯 in tests to bomb so hard the moment he gets distracted with something? Even for Manga/Doujin standards this seems unlikely to me. He probably failed on purpose and is behaving Tsun now.

*Evil Death Note smile*
JUST AS PLANNED!

Dai-chan made the correct choice, degree is not everything in life.
*Says the unemployed college dropper on the internet
While they may be happy, I can't help but feel sorry for the guy. Japanese people really take their exams seriously.
